about_the_game:
✤Story✤

The female warrior Rebecca is the strongest warrior in this small border village.

Rebecca is not only powerful with swordsmanship but also very kind-hearted.

She plays a role similar to the village guardian and is deeply trusted by the villagers.

One day, Rebecca's village was attacked by a group of bandits.

Almost all the villagers were kidnapped, including Takezo, the person of her unrequited love.

So Rebecca embarked on a journey, vowing to defeat the bandits and save the villagers.

In a new continent, Rebecca obtained the magic sword "Cursed Sword".

And this magic sword will greatly change her destiny...!?

When the bandits are defeated and Rebecca successfully takes back her sweetheart, what will happen to the strongest female warrior in the village?

✤Game Content✤

▲Use the port town as your base and conquer each map!

According to the progress, there will be more places to go to.
 

▲You can fight a variety of enemies and gain experience points to level up.
 

▲Various materials will drop on the map, and these materials can be exchanged for money.

content_descriptors.notes: The main character's outfits in this game are overly revealing. All in-game characters are 20 years of age or older.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: One day, Rebecca's village is attacked by a group of thieves. And most of the villagers are taken, including her crush, Takezo. Swearing to defeat the thieves, Rebecca sets out on a journey. What fate awaits the village's strongest female warrior when she rescues her beloved?
supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
